title: Final UK greenhouse gas emissions national statistics
publisher: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
description: Final estimates of UK territorial greenhouse gas emissions.
datasetNotes: On landing page scroll down to contents click the most recent date i.e 2020, this will display a link , click the link this will open another page, scroll down to Documents and the data can be found in XLS and ODS
sizingNotes: The majority of the table are of a simple structure however there numerous footnotes and  some tabs have more than 1 table in different formats.
